record.dc:title: 10-433 John Ausmus Farm Site 2CE10, Claiborne County, Tennessee. Mound 1. Feature 20, Relationship of seventh and eighth structures.
record.wpa:narrative: Floor level of eighth structure 4 ft. 4 in. above hardpan (at center) of structure. Floor level of seventh structure 3 ft. 3 in. above hardpan (at center) of structure. See attached diagram (the floors of these structures sloped slightly toward the center).
record.wpa:comments: Illustration on file at the institution. See also photographs 10-435 [fhm00340], 10-432 [fhm00337], and CE10(K) (945-TVA) [fhm00380], and CE10(M) (944-TVA) [fhm00382].
